filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hi there,歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday回顧星期天在這個節目,John老師會彙整過去不同國家以及主題的熱門更多文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞Let's get started!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: The holidays isn't cheap, especially in Asia.There is therefore little wonder that an increasing number of people have decided to make this Christmas season extra special by doing a lot of crafts on their own.There is something magical about turning something ordinary into something special and there's no better way to display your creations than on your Christmas tree.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: Ideas are shared online and through money-saving Facebook groups such as On a Budget.The members show people how to create a Christmas tree out of just garlands, lights and a wooden frame.There are many photos that show some crafty methods of creating a tree by simply wrapping the green evergreen-like garland around the triangle-shaped wood frame.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: The end result is a stunning, perfectly shaped, wall-mounted Christmas tree.What a great idea, this looks fantastic, one person wrote.Another said, great for anyone who has a small room.In addition to appealing to people who may not have room for an actual tree, the hack is also useful for those who do not want to spend money on Christmas decor that is only good for
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: a few weeks.Shows what you can do with imagination and a small budget, one person wrote.Others shared their own versions of the hack, showing just how festive and easy it can be.Next article.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: In addition, the Royal Christmas Market boasts
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: the most favourite pastry.What's more, there will also be music feasts over the weekends.Some award-winning musicians are invited to play Christmas-themed jazz and orchestra music during the celebrations.Next article.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: The store-lined roads with outside stalls laden with New Year dried fruits, candies, spiced drinks and meat jerkeys are packed with people anxious to stock up for the holiday.The weather was cold on Wednesday, but mercifully sunny to take the bite from the cold, and the air was full of anticipation and festive spirit.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: The sellers themselves, wearing matching lunar New Year jackets and tops in each individual stall, were all in a joyful mood, smiling and joking with the customers as they handed out free samples and took their money.The shoppers were dressed up warm, some in casual clothes, some in their best suits for the occasion.They were monks and foreigners and photographers and mothers bringing their children,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: as well as pet owners, carrying their dogs on their shoulders or pushing them along in pet pushchairs.There was one guy walking his pet pig.He'd had it for five months, he said, which had its snout pressed to the ground, hoovering the tarmac for fallen sweets, treats or dried meats.Next article.EPA steps up checks for carcinogenic industrial dye in mid-autumn mooncakes.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: With the moon autumn festival nearly upon us, bakery shelves are heaving with a vast array of appetizing mooncakes in a mind-boggling variety of shapes, sizes and flavours.For many Taiwanese gourmands, the venerable egg yolk pastry is a special favourite.However, in the past, some unscrupulous businesses were discovered to have added the harmful industrial
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: dye Sudan Red G to their egg yolk pastries to give the salty egg yolks a rosy red luster.Sudan Red G was classified as a toxic chemical by the Environmental Protection Administration in July 2018.The administration says it has been carrying out inspections since the ban but has not discovered any illegal use of Sudan Red G.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: However, with increased demand for egg yolk pastries during the festive season, the administration says it will intensify inspection work during the period.In the past, some egg farms would add the carcinogenic substance to duck feed in order to give their salted duck eggs a deep colour and luster.In 2017, the illegal use of Sudan Red G was detected
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: in an online retailer's salted egg yolk mooncakes.The poultry farm which supplied the egg yolks was required to cull its duck population and destroy its stock of duck eggs.Fraud charges were also brought against the farm.The following year, the EPA classified Sudan Red G as a category 4 toxic chemical.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: It is often used in industrial settings such as
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: shoe polish, floor wax, car wax and oils to give products a rich colour and luster.Sudan Red G's unique properties, inexpensive, easy to obtain, stable and colour-fade resistant, mean that it often crops up in food safety incidents.In addition to salted egg yolks, outside of Taiwan, Sudan Red G has been found to have been added to
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: chili sauce and chili powder.However, the group of dyes with which Sudan Red G shares a common molecular structure are listed as category 3 carcinogens by the International Agency for Research on Cancer.EPA Toxic and Chemical Substances Bureau Director General Xie Yan Rui advises consumers not to choose food products that appear overly vivid
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: and bright or that look unnatural.Xie adds that the nutritional value of egg yolks is the same whether they are yellow or red in colour, and warns that customers who select egg-containing products on the basis of their bright luster may well be consuming adulterated egg yolks.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json

chunks.chunk_text: 也歡迎分享我們官網www.15means.today以及Facebook粉專給親朋好友,同情學英語,improving your English on the go!Catch you in the next one,我們下集見!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 節慶相關時事趣聞 All about festivals.json
